description: Recent content in posts on Fabian Gilson's website

item.title: Good coding practices need an advocate inside the team (or it won't work)
item.description: A few years ago, we looked into how teams deal with the technical debt in a software engineering project course (DOI to paper).

item.title: Teaching about Scrum with paper
item.description: I’ll talk about how we teach about Scrum events and principles in a gamified context.

item.title: Moving to a partial flipped classroom
item.description: This year I tried something “revolutionary”: asking my third year students to read some material before coming to class.

item.title: Glad you're here!
item.description: I’ve finally set up a personal website to sort all of my research and teaching material.
